message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11500. It's a great deal for you, as you know it's worth $12000 to you. Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $10000 is simply too low for me. How about we split the difference? I'm willing to come down to $10750.  This is a fair price, considering the value you place on the product. Let's close this deal.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10750 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so how about $10375?

Bob, I'm starting to get the feeling that we're not going to see eye-to-eye on this price.  However, I'm willing to make one last concession. Let's settle on $10500. This is a good deal for both of us, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the product.
I appreciate your last concession, but I'm still not sure if $10500 is the right price for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway one more time, so how about $10250?
